title: Virtual World-Based Experiential Marketing Education: Enhancing Practical Competencies through Reflective Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Introductory marketing theory and understanding of digital marketing practices
context.additional_context: Providing one digital device (tablet/laptop) per learner, with a blended offline-online classroom environment using virtual world platforms (e.g., Gather.town).

learning_goals: Learners complete experiential learning processes at over 90% while planning and executing marketing campaigns on virtual world platforms
Learners analyze at least three strengths and weaknesses of virtual world marketing through reflective practice journaling
Learners present virtual marketing strategies applicable to real business cases based on team project deliverables
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
